name: Burning Down The Cards
description:
Burning Down The Cards - is a card game with elements of a roguelike themed around fire, thanks to VimJam3's theme

The main mechanic of the game: Burning the cards
On use your cards aren't discarded, but instead upon using the card twice it is burned, being removed until the end of combat.



Code made by me in Construct 2
Art made by me in Construct 2
Music made by me in Beepbox
Sound effects generated in jsfxr and adjusted by me
